Atacked01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy>Phew! <sp:5:0:0>I thought I was done for!<sp:0:4:0>*sigh* If I'd snacked on a silent shroom, I
could have avoided this mess.
SavedLv3_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy>My thanks!<sp:5:0:0> You're quite the strapping
fellow, aren't you?
StartPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Say, do you ever feel sleepy? Heavy?
Lethargic? I know I do. But whenever
I start to drag...
I eat a <clr:0000>rushroom<clr:ffff>!


Just cook up the <clr:0000>rushrooms<clr:ffff> that grow on
sheer cliffs and, golly, you'll have the
perfect pick-me-up!
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL>When you need to be <clr:0000>light on your feet<clr:ffff>,<clr:0000><clr:ffff>
they can't be beat. Everyone agrees, from
Akkala to Zora's Domain!
SavedLv3_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Ease>If you hadn't come, then...<sp:5:0:0> I don't want
to think about it!
SavedLv2_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Ease>Thank you!<sp:5:0:0> My mushrooms and I would
have met a terrible end without you.
Com_Talk_30: <sp:3:0:2:0001>Very good! How many do you need?
SavedLv2_01: <sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy>Golly am I glad you came along!
SavedLv1_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>You saved me! <sp:5:0:0>Wait, the mush—<sp:5:0:0> Phew!<sp:5:1:0>
They're safe too!
Com_Talk_05b: <sp:3:0:2:0001>Now then, sell me anything you like.
ShopGreet_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:LaughS>Now, are you interested in a miracle
ingredient? How about a mushroom!
They're rich in benefits!
ShopGreet_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy>Come take a look! I'm sure you need
some marvelous, miraculous mushrooms!
Com_Talk_36:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy>Sold out! You've made me a happy
merchant today!
Com_Talk_37:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>Thanks to you, I don't have a scrap of
stock left!<sp:5:1:0>

I might not have anything to sell, but
would you like a peek at the goods I'll
have in soon?
RainPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive>When it's raining and you're feeling down,
a <clr:0000>stamella shroom<clr:ffff> will perk you right up!
GoRange_02_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:LaughS>If you eat a dish prepared with <clr:0000>silent
shrooms<clr:ffff>, you'll barely be able to hear
the sound of your own footsteps.
If you plan to do much fleeing in the
night, a <clr:0000>silent shroom<clr:ffff> is a must-have!
Guardian00:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:Scare>What a terrifying monster!<sp:5:0:0> I can't imagine
even the bravest hero could handle THAT.<sp:5:1:0>

<sp:3:0:2:0c01>I wonder if I could whip up a
mushroom dish to increase your
strength and endurance...
GoRange_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:QuestionNormal>Oh?<sp:5:1:0> You sure look down, and a forlorn
face means forlorn feelings aren't far
behind. I know what you need...
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Greeting>This <clr:0000>brightcap<clr:ffff>!


A <clr:0000>brightcap <clr:ffff>won't just brighten up your
cooking, it'll brighten you up too!

So when you're feeling dark and down,
have a nibble. You'll feel better in a flash!
BackRange_02_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:LaughS>If you've ever worried about keeping
your skin in one piece, try cooking up
an <clr:0000>ironshroom<clr:ffff>!
GoRange_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS>After one little nibble of a dish with a
<clr:0000>brightcap<clr:ffff>, you'll brighten up in a flash!
GoRange_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Have you heard about one of <clr:0000>Necluda<clr:ffff>'s
specialties, the <clr:0000>silent shroom<clr:ffff>? 

It's easier to find those sneaky little
mushrooms in the dark. If you manage to
get your hands on one, it's delicious!
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:SurpriseS_00>And—get this—eating one makes you
move more quietly!

Of course, I'd expect nothing less from
something called a <clr:0000>silent shroom<clr:ffff>.<sp:5:0:0> They're
a must if you're hiding or fleeing at night!
BackRange_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>You there!<sp:5:0:0> You have the gloomy face
of someone who can't find what you're
looking for.
I'll bet you need a <clr:0000>brightcap<clr:ffff>! If you cook
and eat it, losing things in the dark will
be a thing of the past!
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughL>If you don't want to carry a light, become
the light!
BackRange_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Do you ever feel frail? Feeble? Wilted?<sp:5:0:0>
Even if you don't, an <clr:0000>ironshroom<clr:ffff> might
be right for you.
Your muscles will bulge!<sp:5:0:0> Your pecs will
swell!<sp:5:0:0> That pesky soft skin will grow as
<clr:0000>hard as nails<clr:ffff>!
If you've ever thought, "I feel pretty safe
from monsters, except in the whole skin
area," then you need an ironshroom!
Com_Talk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy>Much obliged!<sp:5:0:0> Can I take anything else
off your hands?
RainPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Do these rainy days make you feel down?
Dreary? Damp in your very soul? Sounds
like you need...<sp:5:0:0>
a <clr:0000>stamella shroom<clr:ffff>!


Add it to your dishes to give your cooking
a pop of pep.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>This healthy little morsel will give you the
energy boost you need to tackle whatever
the world throws at you!
BackRange_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive>If you cook and eat a <clr:0000>brightcap<clr:ffff>, you'll
light up even the darkest paths. Brilliant!
Com_Talk_04: <sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sad>Is that so...<sp:5:1:0> That's a shame. A real shame.
Com_Talk_05: <sp:3:0:2:0001>I'll take any item off your hands.
ShopGreet_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>So you're interested in my stupendous
spores after all?<sp:5:0:0> Feel free to look as much
as you like!
Com_Talk_06: <sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS>All of my mushrooms are top quality!
Com_Talk_07: <sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Sad>All sold out of that today, I'm afraid.
ShopGoodBye_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive>Come on back whenever you need the
finest mushrooms Hyrule has to offer.
StartPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:TalkPositive>My body feels so heavy...<sp:5:1:0>is what I'd say if
I didn't just eat a <clr:0000>rushroom<clr:ffff>!

If you want to be <clr:0000>light on your feet<clr:ffff>, cook
up one of these honeys and snack away.
Now that's a ruuush!
ShopGoodBye_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive>Take care!<sp:5:1:0> And stay dry!<sp:5:0:0> Days like this,
I'm glad I have a hat...<sp:5:1:0>

Anyway, see you around! Let's hope for
clear weather next time we meet!
Com_Talk_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Sad>Looks like your pouch is full.<sp:5:1:0> Why don't
you make some space and come back?
Com_Talk_12:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Greeting>Take a look at this mushroom medley!<sp:5:1:0>
You won't find a finer collection than this.
Com_Talk_13: <sp:3:0:2:0001>I'll take it! How many will you sell me?
Greeting_00:
So you chased me down, rain be darned?
You've got spirit!
Com_Talk_16:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Notice>Golly, I can't take the clothes right off
your back! At least take them off first.
GoalPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive>If you're interested in <clr:0000>Cece-brand fashion<clr:ffff>,
don't miss <clr:0000>Hateno Village<clr:ffff>!

Head <clr:0000>east<clr:ffff> from the <clr:0000>Dueling Peaks<clr:ffff> and
you'll be there before you know it.
Com_Talk_20:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy>Anyone who braves weather like this to
shop...<sp:5:1:0>deserves to see some special
things in my stock. Take a look!
GoalPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive>Have you passed by any people dressed
like mushrooms on your travels?

It's not weird—it's fashion! There's a
trendy new brand out of <clr:0000>Hateno Village<clr:ffff>
called <clr:0000>Cece<clr:ffff>.
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>I respect any style that's about promoting
mushrooms with your whole body!

If you're interested, how about visiting
<clr:0000>Hateno Village<clr:ffff>? The quickest route is to
go <clr:0000>east <clr:ffff>from the <clr:0000>Dueling Peaks<clr:ffff>.
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:QuestionNormal>Huh? Why am I not wearing it, you ask?<sp:0:4:0>I'm too busy eating mushrooms to
wear 'em!
Com_Talk_11_c:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy>You'll be happy with your purchase,
guaranteed!
Atacked00:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy>You got here just in time!


Now, save me! My mushrooms and I will
find a way to repay you!
